description:
By this type invoice will generate on the basis of PO No.

PO No will save in the Customer's Purchase Order field. PO No will show in the print.

If employees have same PO No then come in one invoice otherwise separate separate invoices

Manpower Cost = Net Pay , Gosi = (Basic + Housing)X2% if Non Saudi , Gosi = (Basic + Housing)X11.75% if Saudi , ERC Fee and Bank Transaction Charges taken from Project profile.

Sales Invoice Items Structure

Item CodeItem NameEmployeeQtyRate

Manpower CostEmployee 11

GosiEmployee 11
if more than one employee then two rows same as above will be added for each employee with employee name




ERC Fee
no of employees

Bank Transaction Charges
no of employees

description:
By this type only one invoice will generate contains only one row in the table with Grand Total (Totals of each employee Manpower Cost(Net pay), ERC Fee).

description:
By this type invoices will generate on the basis of PO Nos. In the Employee master we have PO management in which there are three options PO for Manpower, PO for Rotation, PO for Neom Allowance.

So, Invoices generated for Each PO for Manpower with all employees that have same PO No.

Same flow used for PO for Rotation and PO for Neom Allowance

PO No will save in the Customer's Purchase Order field. PO No will show in the print.

Sales Invoice Items Structure for Manpower PO

Manpower Cost = Net Pay - Rotation Amount - Neom Allowance Amount , Gosi = (Basic + Housing)X2% if Non Saudi , Gosi = (Basic + Housing)X11.75% if Saudi , ERC Fee and Bank Transaction Charges taken from Project profile.

Item CodeItem NameEmployeeQtyRate

Manpower CostEmployee 11

GosiEmployee 11

Manpower CostEmployee 21

GosiEmployee 21





if more than one employee then two rows same as above will be added for each employee with employee name




ERC Fee
no of employees

Bank Transaction Charges
no of employees

Sales Invoice Items Structure for Rotation PO

Reimbursement Expense = Amount of Salary Component for Rotation , Admin Fee = Reimbursement Expense X 10%

Item CodeItem NameEmployeeQtyRate

ReimbursementEmployee 11Reimbusement Expense

Admin Fee 10%Employee 11Admin Fee

ReimbursementEmployee 21Reimbusement Expense

Admin Fee 10%Employee 21Admin Fee
if more than one employee then two rows same as above will be added for each employee with employee name








Sales Invoice Items Structure for Neom Allowance PO

Value = Amount of Salary Component for Neom Allowance

Item CodeItem NameEmployeeQtyRate

Special AllowanceEmployee 11Value

Special AllowanceEmployee 21Value
if more than one employee then one row same as above will be added for each employee with employee name
name: Invoice based on per PO with other POs
type: Invoice based on per PO with other POs

description:
By this type only one invoice will generate contains only one row in the table with Location and Department Grand Total (Totals of each employee Manpower Cost(Net pay), Gosi, ERC Fee and Bank Transaction Charges).

Manpower Cost = Net Pay , Gosi = (Basic + Housing)X2% if Non Saudi , Gosi = (Basic + Housing)X11.75% if Saudi , ERC Fee and Bank Transaction Charges taken from Project profile.

Sales Invoice Items Structure

Item CodeItem NameQtyRate
Manpower CostLogistics - Dammam1Grand Total

Explanation:

Like Locaitons: Riyadh, Dammam, Jaddah, Makkah, etc

Under the Location there are Multiple Department like: Service, Logistics, WHS, Finance etc

So, Separate Invoice will generate on each pattern e.g

1) invoice of employee that exist in Riyadh - Services

2) invoice of employee that exist in Riyadh - Logistics

3) invoice of employee that exist in Riyadh - WHS

4) invoice of employee that exist in Riyadh - Finance

So, same above flow will use for other locations and departments
name: One Invoice with all employees total dept wise one line only
type: One Invoice with all employees total dept wise one line only
